extension.summary: Scrapes video torrents from 'My Files :: Finished' into your library. Check www.furk.net/text/mc for more info.
extension.description: This is not longer supported, please download Furk Library 2 from alicanlakot's library.
extension.disclaimer: You must have a premium account (9 euros per month, 200GB limit) at www.furk.net for this addon to function.
